com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager

Class ActionManager.Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kontakt.sdk.android.manager.ActionManager.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagerConfiguration
    Enclosing class:
    ActionManager

    public static final class ActionManager.Configuration
extends Object
implements ManagerConfiguration
    Each of the managers has its own configuration which is built and delivered to collaborating Service. The configuration contains listeners and parameters specifying how beacons interaction should be performed. The Action Manager Configuration. The Configuration delivers parameters which influence behaviour of the actions support and maintaining process.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ActionManager.Configuration.Builder
      Configuration builder is responsible for creating immutable configuration which acts as a parameters and callbacks supplier and thus describes desired behaviour.

    • Field Detail

      • actionsCache

        public final LruCache<Integer,SparseArray<List<com.kontakt.sdk.core.interfaces.model.IAction<Device>>>> actionsCache
        The Memory cache size (in bytes). The Action Service (ActionService) which collaborates with Action Manager performs http requests thanks to the RestClient (KontaktApiClient) in order to load previously defined actions for beacons in certain proximities. Once the action is loaded, it is cached in internal memory of the device. The cache is based on LruCache implementation. Depending on the cache size the number of the http requests may be limited or actions may be loaded every time they are desired and unpresent in internal cache. Please note, that it is advisable to provide size which will allow to reduce http requests to the minimum. You can easily specify, how many units and of which type should be reserved for the internal cache. If not set, 0 bytes is reserved for the internal cache.
        See Also:
        Android SDK documentation - LruCache

      • actionNotifier

        public final ActionManager.ActionNotifier actionNotifier
        The Action notifier (ActionManager.ActionNotifier). The Action notifier is responsible for launching callback methods with found Actions. This parameter should be set before actions support enabling. If not set, the default notifier is applied which does not notify about anyting.

      • requestExecutor

        public final ExecutorService requestExecutor
        The Action Request executor.
